11.So remember...not memes. Not bad lip reading videos. Not crowd sizes. Not the hair. Not jobs. Those are all distractions. These are Nazis
10. Even more rogue. That could even be what he is trying to stoke now. That's how devious these guys are.
9. And it has to be tackled now before a "black swan" event like 9/11 or Lehman Brothers comes along and gives Trump Carte Blanche to go
8. Tv show or a twitter feud. This is the real world and these are real Nazis back again. I am absolutely 100% sure of that. Do something.
7. Consensus. It won't. These guys are in charge of the asylum and they are complete racist, fascist lunatics. This isn't a reality
6. Are winning this hands down though. Nobody I talked to outside media today really cared that much. It'll sort itself out is general ...
5. People probably said "ah they'll be fine" about the nazis too in 1935. We can't just all ignore this. I genuinely think Trump and co..
4. All thinking they have a lot to lose with regulatory changes. There is much more at stake here. These people are actual psychopaths..
3. The worrying thing though is 99% of smart and sane people tolerating this. @elonmusk and the entire tech community. Global leaders...
2. And manipulation. The general public already ambivalent towards truth given wildness of lies. Nothing seems real. That's a game plan.
1. People need to realise this is the Nazis all over again. Worse as these madmen have 6000 nukes. The media are being torn apart by lies..
